title: NICE
description: NICE helps practitioners and commissioners get the best care to patients, fast, while ensuring value for the taxpayer.
cleaned_text: Guidance Evidence-based recommendations developed by independent committees, including professionals and lay members, and consulted on by stakeholders. Get involved We want you to be involved in our work. There are many ways you can [get involved as a healthcare professional or a member of the public](/get-involved). Tell us what matters to you, your organisation or your community and we'll share our latest news, features and guidance. About us Find out more about and how we support [Our transformation plan](https://www.nice.org.uk/about/who-we-are/corporate-publications/the-nice-strategy-2021-to-2026) explains how we are evolving to meet the changing needs of the health and care system. Explore NICE [Into practice](/about/what-we-do/into-practice) Resources to help you use our guidance and quality standards. [Financial planning](/about/what-we-do/our-programmes/cost-savings-resource-planning) Advice and tools to help you make the best use of your resources. [Antimicrobial resistance](/guidance/health-protection/communicable-diseases/antimicrobial-stewardship) View our antimicrobial prescribing guidelines. [Our role in patient safety](/about/what-we-do/our-programmes/patient-safety) Our guidelines make evidence-based, best practice recommendations. [Find journals and databases](/about/what-we-do/evidence-services/journals-and-databases) Access to a range of journals and other evidence-based resources.
